Tim, 
=A0
I experience something similar on a regular basis. 
=A0
My "crew"=
 usually begins immediately (sometimes less than 20 or 30 seconds and often=
 as soon as the box is turned on)=A0with my name and the words "START",=A0"=
Here" or "Hello" to show me that we've made proper contact and the connecti=
on is clear. 
=A0
The sessions=A0typically=A0end in much the same way with =
a loud "STOP!" or "end" to signal that we're finished. =A0
=A0
I've attache=
d an example of my own and thank you for sharing! 
=A0
It's incredibly inte=
resting to=A0read about and hear=A0the communication "systems"=A0employed b=
y other researchers. 
=A0
-Jerome=A0=A0
--0-94620857-1287930786=:3763
